ErrNoHalosFound Class Reference

Exception: No halo distribution computed or found This exception is called if operations are attempted on the halo distribution, but no such halo distribution has been calculated (through FindHalos()) or loaded (not yet available). More...

#include <Exceptions.h>

Public Member Functions

 ErrNoHalosFound ()

Detailed Description

Exception: No halo distribution computed or found This exception is called if operations are attempted on the halo distribution, but no such halo distribution has been calculated (through FindHalos()) or loaded (not yet available).
